sql.content: SELECT 'uid=' + A.Base_PerNo + ',ou=users,dc=wzyb,dc=com' AS userID ,A.Base_PerNo AS userNo ,A.Base_Pername AS userName ,LEFT(A.Base_Pername ,1) AS surname ,A.Base_GroupID AS groupNo ,B.Base_GroupName AS groupName ,A.Base_CardNo AS cardNo ,A.Base_Modify_DateTime AS lastTime ,A.Base_IsDel FROM General_Personnel A ,General_Group B WHERE A.Base_GroupID = B.Base_GroupID AND A.Base_IsDel = 0 AND B.Base_IsDel = 0 ORDER BY 1
